reviewText:
Early Access Review

A great remake of a classic dos game. A little rough around the edges but captures the spirit of the first game and builds upon it's strengths.

8/10 for now, menu is quite glitchy sometimes, and hopefully we can get a map editor and workshop support for this...these two things would make it an easy 10/10.

Early Access Review\n\nFun, but the controls are a little off, and the handling feels floaty and unresponsive.  I'd wait on this one.  I go into a little more detail in this video (the Wacky Wheels section starts at around the 20:55 mark.  https://youtu.be/TXMFHqFefQo

reviewText:
Early Access Review

Though there are technical problems (FPS drops, glitches etc.) the game itself is fun, and with the multiplayer added later (no region lock) it would seem like a no brainer for 10â‚¬.

Further polish is needed (controls, mechanics, content), but devs are listening to the community and working on the issues.

For now (Early Access) I see no huge reason not to give this revival a chance and relive fond childhood memories.
Early Access Review\n\nIt's so rare to see a PC game featuring a 4 players split screen mode and even if it still need some optimizations, the game feels pretty promising!
